presentation_title: The 1st International Congress on Phonetics and Poetics
presentation_text: The 1st International Congress on Phonetics and Poetics -created by the homonymous group that connects the universities of Granada, Santiago de Chile and Concepción, in collaboration with the European project Voices of Spanish Poets- is the first scientific meeting -in recent times- dedicated to the dissemination of the phonetic-acoustic study of poetry and from an interdisciplinary perspective. Its modality will be completely virtual and free of charge, in order to favor the participation of all researchers in this area of study and who are deployed around the world.

group.title: Phonetics and Poetics Research Group
group.content_1: A group united by the idea that phonetic studies and poetic studies are closely related.
content_2: Domingo Román Montes de Oca (University of Santiago, Chile)
content_3: To approach the instrumental phonetic study of Spanish language poetry
To promote the instrumental phonetic study of poetry as a legitimate (and neglected) research area
To build an international network of researchers working on the topic with similar and different scientific approaches
To propose various instances to disseminate this research perspective of the poetic object
